import React, { useContext } from "react"; import { AppContext } from "../context/Context"; const FilterModal = ({ handleModalClose }) => { const { themeMode } = useContext(AppContext); return (
Filter Options

  • 25k
  • 50K
  • 100K
  • 250K
  • 500K
  • 1000K

Influencer's Gender

); }; export default FilterModal;
